text: Manthorpe is the name of two places, both in the South Kesteven district of Lincolnshire, England *Manthorpe, Grantham *Manthorpe, Bourne It is also an English language surname: *Charles Manthorpe (1836–1898), Congregationalist minister in Glenelg, South Australia *Jonathan Manthorpe is a Canadian author and political journalist with The Vancouver Sun
title: Manthorpe
